title: As the Eagles and Chiefs prepare to face off at the Super Bowl , meet the player extremely glamorous WAGs
body_text:
As the Eagles and Chiefs prepare to face off at the Super Bowl, meet the players' extremely glamorous WAGs
- The Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles will face off this weekend
- The stands will be filled with the NFL players' stunning wives and girlfriends
- Here, FEMAIL has taken a look into the top players' glamorous partners
The Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles are set to face off this weekend at the 2025 Super Bowl.
And while all eyes will certainly be on the field during the coveted football game, the stands will be just as exciting as they will be filled with the NFL players' stunning wives and girlfriends.
Most famous is arguably Travis Kelce's blonde beauty Taylor Swift - the singer was first linked to the Chiefs' tight end in late 2023, and the entire world has been enthralled with the couple ever since.
But who exactly are the women behind the other sports stars? As the Super Bowl approaches, FEMAIL has taken a look into some of the two teams' very glamorous partners.
Dating a famous football player certainly comes with its fair share of perks, and many of the women are not shy about showing them off.
They often flaunt their lavish lifestyles online, which includes taking many luxury vacations around the globe, staying in five-star resorts, eating in upscale restaurants, attending elite parties, and of course, sitting sideline at the games.
From their own careers and accomplishments to how they met their sports star boyfriends, here's everything you need to know about the WAGs of the top players expected to take the field on Sunday.
Kansas City Chiefs
Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes
Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick, 29, began dating his now-wife Brittany while they were teens both attending Whitehouse High School in Texas
After graduating from their schools, Brittany joined an Icelandic professional soccer team while Patrick was signed to the Kansas City Chiefs, but their relationship kept going strong
In September 2020, Patrick got down on one knee and asked Brittany to marry him. They're seen months earlier, in February 2020
Later that month, the couple announced that they were expecting their first child together, and they welcomed their daughter, Sterling, in February 2021
Chiefs' quarterback Patrick Mahomes, 29, began dating now-wife Brittany while they were teens both attending Whitehouse High School in Texas.
They stayed together all through college, even though they attended different schools.
After graduating from their schools, Brittany joined Icelandic professional soccer team Afturelding/Fram while Patrick was signed to the Kansas City Chiefs.
Despite both of them focusing on their blossoming athletic careers, their relationship kept going strong, and in September 2020, Patrick got down on one knee and asked Brittany to marry him.
Later that month, the couple announced that they were expecting their first child together, and welcomed daughter Sterling in February 2021.
They went on to tie the knot in March 2022, in Maui, Hawaii, and two months later, they revealed that they were expecting another baby together.
They went on to tie the knot in March 2022, in Maui, Hawaii, and two months later, they revealed that they were expecting another baby together
Their son, Patrick 'Bronze' III, was born in November 2022. The family is seen in 2023
The couple announced that they were expecting once again in July 2024, and they gave birth to a baby girl, named Golden, earlier this month
Brittany, 29, has stood fiercely by Patrick's side as his football career has flourished, and she's often spotted cheering him on at Chiefs games. They're seen in November
Their son, Patrick 'Bronze' III, was born in November 2022.
The couple announced that they were expecting once again in July 2024, and they gave birth to a baby girl, named Golden, earlier this month.
Brittany, 29, has stood fiercely by Patrick's side as his football career has flourished, and she's often spotted cheering him on at Chiefs games.
After she wasn't renewed by the Afturelding/Fram team in 2018, Brittany retired from soccer and became a certified fitness trainer.
She has also launched her own workout brand, and she is a founding co-owner of the NWSL team the Kansas City Current.
Brittany seems to be close with Taylor, as they're often photographed watching Chiefs games together in the VIP suite.
The ladies even went on a double date to the US Open last year, along with their respective partners.
Chris Jones and Sheawna Weathersby
Chiefs defensive tackle Chris Jones, 30, has been dating Sheawna Weathersby since November 2015
They have welcomed two sons together - Chris II in 2018 and Carson in 2022. The family is seen in 2023
Sheawna works as a licensed esthetician and runs her own online clothing store called Cliquely She Boutique
Sheawna and Chris are pretty private when it comes to their romance, and rarely ever share photos together
Chiefs' defensive tackle Chris Jones, 30, has been dating Sheawna Weathersby since November 2015.
Sheawna has formed a close friendship with Taylor, as she's shared numerous photos with the pop sensation at Chiefs games
They have welcomed two sons together - Chris II in 2018 and Carson in 2022.
Sheawna works as a licensed esthetician and runs her own online clothing store called Cliquely She Boutique.
Sheawna and Chris are pretty private when it comes to their romance, and rarely ever share photos together.
Like Brittany, Sheawna has formed a close friendship with Taylor, as she's shared numerous photos with the pop sensation at Chiefs games.
Taylor even sent her and Chris a slew of Christmas gifts last holiday season.
While it's unclear what exactly was in them because they were still wrapped in the photo, Sheawna uploaded a snap to her Instagram of the presents, which included a huge box, a smaller box, and an enormous gift bag.
The singer also sent them a rare Louis Vuitton 200 bottle of champagne bottled in Anchay, France.
A note attached to them written in Taylor's handwriting read, 'Merry Christmas She She and Chris. From, Travis and Taylor.'
Creed Humphrey and Ana Demmer
Chiefs center Creed Humphrey, 25, is currently in a relationship with a woman named Ana Demmer
According to her LinkedIn, Ana graduated from the University of Arkansas - Fort Smith in 2020 with a degree in media communications
She then went on to University of Louisiana Monroe for her masters of public administration degree, which she received in 2021
She and Creeds recently celebrated their one year anniversary, with Ana posting a touching tribute to Instagram in honor of the big day
'A year of adventure, laughter, and joy. I love you everyday and all the time Creedie,' she gushed. 'Happy one-year anniversary, my heaven sent man'
Chiefs' center Creed Humphrey, 25, is currently in a relationship with Ana Demmer.
According to her LinkedIn, Ana graduated from the University of Arkansas - Fort Smith in 2020 with a degree in media communications.
She then went on to University of Louisiana Monroe for her masters of public administration degree, which she received in 2021.
She now works as a community engagement social media specialist for the company Garmin.
In addition, Ana is passionate about volleyball and played throughout college.
She and Creeds recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, with Ana posting a touching tribute to Instagram in honor of the big day.
'A year of adventure, laughter, and joy. I love you everyday and all the time Creedie,' she gushed. 'Happy one-year anniversary, my heaven sent man.'
Trent McDuffie and Gabby Esposito
Chiefs cornerback Trent McDuffie, 24, recently went public with his girlfriend, Gabby Esposito; they debuted their relationship in May 2024
At the time, she posted a loved up snap with the sports star to Instagram, which she captioned, 'Oops. Been in such good company I almost forgot to mention...'
Chiefs' cornerback Trent McDuffie, 24, recently went public with his girlfriend, Gabby Esposito.
They debuted their relationship in May 2024, when she posted a loved up snap with the sports star to Instagram, which she captioned, 'Oops. Been in such good company I almost forgot to mention...'
Since then, they've been complete couple goals.
Gabby grew up in Kansas and participated in competitive dance for 14 years.
She is currently studying psychology at the University of Arkansas while also working at the permanent jewelry company Link x Lou.
Gabby grew up in Kansas and participated in competitive dance for 14 years
She is currently studying psychology at the University of Arkansas while also working at the permanent jewelry company Link x Lou
'Once she completes her undergraduate studies, Gabby plans to continue with grad school in hopes of becoming a psychotherapist,' her bio on Link x Lou's website reads
'Once she completes her undergraduate studies, Gabby plans to continue with grad school in hopes of becoming a psychotherapist,' her bio on Link x Lou's website reads.
Her favorite hobbies include 'working out, shopping, and trying new restaurants' but she's also passionate about giving back.
'Gabby's current passion project is serving the children of Arkansas Children's Miracle Network Hospital,' it adds.
'Being able to contribute to bringing light to sick children and their families has been beyond fulfilling for her and is something Gabby hopes to continue beyond her years as a college student.'
Justin Reid and Marissa Rand
Chiefs safety Justin Reid, 27, has been in a relationship with Marissa Rand since September 2022
Marissa graduated from Texas A&M University in 2017 with a degree in business administration
She now works as an investment consultant and financial advisor at Fidelity Investments
The couple announced that they were expecting their first child together back in October, and their daughter, Cielle, was born earlier this week. They're seen last year
Chiefs' safety Justin Reid, 27, has been in a relationship with Marissa Rand since September 2022.
Marissa graduated from Texas A&M University in 2017 with a degree in business administration.
She now works as an investment consultant and financial advisor at Fidelity Investments.
The couple announced that they were expecting their first child together back in October, when Marissa showed up on the sidelines at one of his games with a poster that said, 'Justin I'm pregnant.'
Their daughter, Cielle, was born earlier this week.
'It was a busy weekend for me,' Justin joked during a Chiefs press conference on January 22 following the team's win against the Houston Texans.
'I had my baby girl which was the highlight, even better than the divisional win,' he joked.
George Karlaftis and Kaia Harris
Chiefs defensive end George Karlaftis, 23, is happily in love with a woman named Kaia Harris
They first got together in 2016 while they were attending high school together in West Lafayette, Indiana. They're seen recently
Kai, who is extremely private and doesn't have a public Instagram, has popped up on George's feed a few times but mostly stays out of the spotlight
Chiefs' defensive end George Karlaftis, 23, is happily in love with Kaia Harris.
Kaia earned a degree in science focused on marketing from Purdue University in 2022. She then headed to the University of Missouri-Columbia to get her Doctor of Law
They first got together in 2016 while they were attending high school together in West Lafayette, Indiana.
Kaia earned a degree in science focused on marketing from Purdue University in 2022.
She then headed to the University of Missouri-Columbia to get her Doctor of Law, which she's set to earn this May.
She is also a runner, and competed in track and field during college.
On their anniversary in 2021, George shared a sweet tribute to his high school sweetheart.
'Can't believe it's already been five years @kaia.harris. Seems like it was just yesterday when I met you at Lambert… wow,' he wrote.
'I love you so much and can't wait to see what the future holds for us.'
Since then, Kai, who is extremely private and doesn't have a public Instagram, has popped up on his feed a few times but mostly stayed out of the spotlight.
Xavier Worthy and Tia Jones
Chiefs' wide receiver Xavier Worthy, 21, is gearing up to tie the knot with his girlfriend, Tia Jones
Tia, 24, is an athlete herself, and has a successful career as a track and field star
Chiefs' wide receiver Xavier Worthy, 21, is gearing up to tie the knot with his girlfriend, Tia Jones.
Tia, 24, is an athlete herself, and has a successful career as a track and field star.
Back in 2016, at age 15, she won the 100-meter hurdles at the 2016 USA Junior Championships, and last year, she competed at the 2024 Paris Olympic trials.
It's unclear when exactly they started dating, but Tia revealed on The Pregame Podcast With Tokyo and Sydnee last year that their relationship kicked off after he DMed her on Instagram.
While she said she initially ignored his message, everything changed when she relocated to Texas, where he was living at the time, and they coincidentally crossed paths.
It's unclear when exactly they started dating, but Tia revealed on The Pregame Podcast With Tokyo and Sydnee last year that their relationship kicked off after he DMed her on Instagram
They announced that they were engaged last July, right after they bought their first home together
'He DMed me before, but I didn't respond, 'cause, you know, it's Instagram. Swipe in, swipe out,' she shared.
'Time went by, I moved to Texas to train with my coach. He was going to [University of Texas] at the time, and we met at a restaurant. I saw him at a restaurant.
'[He gave me a look like], "I've been looking for you."'
She said he asked her out on a date that night and she agreed, and the rest is history.
They announced that they were engaged last July, right after they bought their first home together.
The footballer got down on one knee on a beach in front of a romantic heart-shaped rose arch.
Leo Chenal and Randi Chenel
Chiefs' linebacker Leo Chenal, 24, started dating his now-wife Randi back in 2018, when he was still attending University of Wisconsin
Leo popped the question in December 2021, and they wed just two months later only in front of their parents, siblings, and grandparents
The couple became parents in April 2023, welcoming a baby girl named Everly
Randi does her best to stay out of the public eye and her Instagram is set to private, so very little is known about her
Chiefs' linebacker Leo Chenal, 24, started dating his now-wife Randi back in 2018, when he was still attending University of Wisconsin.
The athlete has said that he 'wouldn't be where he is without her.'
Leo popped the question in December 2021, and they wed just two months later only in front of their parents, siblings, and grandparents, which was followed by a huge celebration in July 2022.
The couple became parents in April 2023, welcoming a baby girl named Everly.
Randi does her best to stay out of the public eye and her Instagram is set to private, so very little is known about her.
Nick Bolton and Phalen Ellesse
Chiefs' lineback Nick Bolton, 24, is currently dating a woman named Phalen Ellesse
While it's unclear when they first got together, he first popped up on her Instagram in February 2024 after the Chiefs won the Super Bowl
Chiefs' lineback Nick Bolton, 24, is currently dating a woman named Phalen Ellesse.
While it's unclear when they first got together, he first popped up on her Instagram in February 2024 after the Chiefs won the Super Bowl.
'Two times champ. Blessed and forever proud,' she captioned a post that showed her hugging the footballer. 'My MVP.'
Drue Tranquill and Jackie Tranquill
Chiefs linebacker Drue Tranquill, 29, is happily married to a woman named Jackie Tranquill, who works as a health and wellness educator at Saint Joseph Health System in Indiana
She and Drue started dating in high school, and he proposed during a romantic getaway to Iceland at a lighthouse right by the ocean. They're seen recently
Chiefs linebacker Drue Tranquill, 29, is happily married to a woman named Jackie Tranquill.
Jackie works as a health and wellness educator at Saint Joseph Health System in Indiana.
She got her bachelors degree in Dietetics from Purdue University.
She and Drue started dating in high school, and he proposed during a romantic getaway to Iceland at a lighthouse right by the ocean.
They tied the knot in July 2018, which Drue described as the 'most precious moment of his entire life' on Instagram afterwards.
They tied the knot in July 2018, which Drue described as the 'most precious moment of his entire life' on Instagram afterwards
They went on to welcome one son, Elijah, in 2019, and two daughters, Anna in 2021 and Mackenzie in 2022
On their wedding anniversary last July, Jackie gushed, 'Six years. We've done a lot in that time. Three precious precious babies, five moves, and lots of amazing highs and lows'
'Watching my bride walk down the aisle was the most precious moment of my entire life… Thank you for lighting up my world Mrs. Tranquill, life is so much fun with you,' he wrote.
They went on to welcome one son, Elijah, in 2019, and two daughters, Anna in 2021 and Mackenzie in 2022.
On their wedding anniversary last July, Jackie reflected on everything they have achieved together.
'Six years. Happy Anniversary my love! We've done a lot in that time,' she wrote.
'Three precious precious babies, five moves, and lots of amazing highs and lows. One thing is for sure - I love you more everyday. Six more years please.'
EAGLES
Saquon Barkley and Anna Congdon
Eagles' running back Saquon Barkley, 27, made the shock announcement that he was engaged to his longtime girlfriend, Anna Congdon, earlier this week
He confirmed the news to People, gushing, 'I can't be the athlete I am and have the success I have so in my career without the help of her'
Eagles' running back Saquon Barkley, 27, made the shock announcement that he was engaged to his longtime girlfriend, Anna Congdon, earlier this week.
He confirmed the news to People, gushing, 'I can't be the athlete I am and have the success I have so in my career without the help of her.
'She's been super helpful and always has my back, not only in football but throughout life there's a lot that goes on.
'But as we continue to grow and mature and go through life together, we continue getting closer and continue to get even better.
'And it's a beautiful thing because we have two amazing children that we were raised it and we just sit back and laugh sometimes when they're over there playing and just smile and think about where everything started.'
The two met at Penn State University and started dating in 2017. They welcomed their daughter, Jada, in 2018, followed by their son, Saquon Jr., in 2022.
Lane Johnson and Kelsey Holmer
Eagles' offensive tackle Lane Johnson, 34, went public with his girlfriend, Kelsey Holmer, in 2022, and have been as happy as could be together ever since
The pair love to flaunt their relationship on Instagram, with both often sharing cute and loved up photos together
While it's unclear what Kelsey does for work, she's seems to be pursing a career in content creation, as she's promoted a few brands on her Instagram in recent years
It appears as though she loves to travel, and she often jets off on glamorous trips around the globe. She's also extremely supportive of Lane and is often at his games
Eagles' offensive tackle Lane Johnson, 34, went public with his girlfriend, Kelsey Holmer, in 2022, and have been as happy as could be together ever since.
The pair love to flaunt their relationship on Instagram, with both often sharing cute and loved up photos together.
While it's unclear what Kelsey does for work, she's seems to be pursing a career in content creation, as she's promoted a few brands on her Instagram in recent years.
It appears as though she loves to travel, and she often jets off on glamorous trips around the globe.
She's also extremely supportive of Lane and is often at his games.
Zack Baun and Ali Baun
Eagles' lineback Zack Baun, 28, tied the knot with his wife, Ali Baun, back in 2020, and they welcomed a baby boy, named Elian, together in April 2024
Ali, who graduated from the University of Wisconsin-Madison in 2018 with a degree in media studies, currently works as a property coordinator at WS Development
Before that, she worked as a wedding photographer for five years, and previously served as the lead resident relations coordinator at an apartment building in Wisconsin, per her LinkedIn
Eagles' lineback Zack Baun, 28, tied the knot with his wife, Ali Baun, back in 2020.
Ali, who graduated from the University of Wisconsin-Madison in 2018 with a degree in media studies, currently works as a property coordinator at WS Development.
Before that, she worked as a wedding photographer for five years, and previously served as the lead resident relations coordinator at an apartment building in Wisconsin, per her LinkedIn.
She and Zack first met at the University of Wisconsin, and after they wed in 2020, they couldn't stop gushing over one another online.
'That over-the-moon type feeling... well I'm drowning in it. Yesterday I married the man of my dreams, under the sun, in the city we now call home,' Ali said at the time. 'Here's to sharing a lifetime of love, laughter, and light.'
The athlete added in his own post, 'I married not only my best friend but the love of my life. Can't wait to spend the rest of my life with you- I love you forever.'
They welcomed a baby boy, named Elian, together in April 2024.
Jordan Mailata and Niki Ikahihifo
Eagles' offensive tackle Jordan Mailata, 27, started dating a woman named Niki Ikahihifo after she caught his eye at the Reading Terminal Market in Philadelphia
Four years later, the footballer got down on one knee and proposed to Niki at the exact spot that they met
Niki originally hails from Alaska and got her Juris Doctor from Duke University School of Law and her masters in psychology from Duke University Graduate School
They went on to tie the knot in July 2023, in Maui, Hawaii
Eagles' offensive tackle Jordan Mailata, 27, started dating Niki Ikahihifo after she caught his eye at the Reading Terminal Market in Philadelphia.
Four years later, the footballer got down on one knee and proposed to Niki at the exact spot that they met.
They went on to tie the knot in July 2023, in Maui, Hawaii.
Niki originally hails from Alaska and got her Juris Doctor from Duke University School of Law and her masters in psychology from Duke University Graduate School.
She works as a intellectual property associate, per her LinkedIn.
A.J. Brown and Kelsey Riley
Eagles' wide receiver A.J. Brown, 27, and his girlfriend, Kelsey Riley, have done their best to keep their romance under wraps
Very little is known about when they got together, but they share two kids: a daughter named Jersee, who was born in 2020, and a son named A.J. Jr., who was born in 2022
While the two don't post much about their romance online, Kelsey is often in the crowd at A.J.'s games
Eagles' wide receiver A.J. Brown, 27, and his girlfriend, Kelsey Riley, have done their best to keep their romance under wraps.
Very little is known about how they met or when they got together, but they share two kids: a daughter named Jersee, who was born in 2020, and a son named A.J. Jr., who was born in 2022.
While the two don't post much about their romance online, Kelsey is often in the crowd at A.J.'s games.
He made a rare appearance on her Instagram feed last week, when she shared a few snaps that showed her cozying up to the football star, which she captioned with some heart emojis.
Kelsey is a former college-level softball player and a graduate from Texas Southern University. She also dabbled in modeling in the past.
Landon Dickerson and Brooke Dickerson
Eagles' center Landon Dickerson, 26, met Brooke Dickerson at Florida State University when they ended up in the same philosophy class
They started dating in May 2017, and got engaged on their four-year anniversary. They wed in March 2023 during an intimate ceremony in South Carolina
Brooke played beach volleyball at Florida State, where she graduated from with a degree in marketing and finance
She then got her masters in business from the University of Alabama, and she now works as the growth marketing specialist at Anthropologie
Eagles' center Landon Dickerson, 26, met Brooke Dickerson at Florida State University when they ended up in the same philosophy class.
They started dating in May 2017, and got engaged on their four-year anniversary.
They wed in March 2023 during an intimate ceremony in South Carolina at a church that sat at the bottom of a mountain.
'A mountain wedding made sense as Landon grew up in the mountains, and I enjoy hiking,' Brooke explained afterwards.
Brooke played beach volleyball at Florida State, where she graduated from with a degree in marketing and finance.
She then got her masters in business from the University of Alabama, and she now works as the growth marketing specialist at Anthropologie.
DeVonta Smith and Mya Danielle
Eagles wide receiver, DeVonta Smith, 26, proposed to his longtime girlfriend, Mya Danielle, on New Year's Eve in 2024
While it's unclear when they first got together, they went public with their romance in January 2023. They went on to welcome a daughter, named Kyse, in October 2023
And in December 2024, they confirmed that they're expecting another child together
Eagles' wide receiver, DeVonta Smith, 26, proposed to his longtime girlfriend, Mya Danielle, on New Year's Eve in 2024.
He got down on one knee and popped the question on a rooftop in front of a stunning flower arch.
DeVonta also decorated the roof with a slew of candles and enlisted a violinist to perform, to ensure it was as romantic as could be.
Mya added a snap of her diamond ring to her Instagram Stories at the time, writing, 'Ending the year a fiancée.'
While it's unclear when they first got together, they went public with their romance in January 2023.
They went on to welcome a daughter, named Kyse, in October 2023. And in December 2024, they confirmed that they're expecting another child together.
DeVonta is a graduate from Southern University and A&M College in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
Dallas Goedert and Aria Meyer
Eagles' tight end Dallas Goedert, 30, is total couple goals with his high school sweetheart, Aria Meyer
The two have known each other since they were just kids as they both grew up in the same town in South Dakota
It's likely they bonded over their love of sports as Aria played volleyball, basketball, and track and field during high school
She attended South Dakota State University, where she decided to pursue a career in medicine and majored in nursing when she graduated in 2017
After college, she began to work as a travel nurse
Eagles' tight end Dallas Goedert, 30, is total couple goals with his high school sweetheart, Aria Meyer.
The two have known each other since they were just kids as they both grew up in the same town in South Dakota.
It's likely they bonded over their love of sports as Aria played volleyball, basketball, and track and field during high school.
She attended South Dakota State University, where she decided to pursue a career in medicine and majored in nursing when she graduated in 2017.
After college, she began to work as a travel nurse.
Cooper DeJean and Steph Wilfawn
Eagles' defensive back Cooper DeJean, 21, will likely have his girlfriend, Steph Wilfawn, in the audience cheering him on at the Super Bowl
They debuted their romance last July, and since then, she's been extremely supportive
Steph is currently a student at the University of Iowa and is majoring in enterprise leadership. She works as a certified dermatology technician, per her LinkedIn
Eagles' defensive back Cooper DeJean, 21, will likely have his girlfriend, Steph Wilfawn, in the audience cheering him on at the Super Bowl.
They debuted their romance last July, and since then, she's been extremely supportive.
Steph is currently a student at the University of Iowa and is majoring in enterprise leadership.
She works as a certified dermatology technician, and has experience in medical terminology, EMR systems, and patient care, per her LinkedIn.
Darius Slay and Jennifer Slay
Eagles' cornerback Darius Slay, 34, is happily married to Division II collegiate athlete Jennifer Slay
Both Darius and Jennifer became parents as teens from separate relationships, so when they met during their senior year of college in 2015, they bonded over that fact
They soon started dating, and together, they welcomed their daughter Desirae in 2017. They tied the knot in 2018 and welcomed a son, named Desmond, in 2021
Jennifer now works as a model. During college, she played basketball for the Southwestern Oklahoma State Bulldogs
Eagles' cornerback Darius Slay, 34, is happily married to Division II collegiate athlete Jennifer Slay.
During college, she played basketball for the Southwestern Oklahoma State Bulldogs.
Both Darius and Jennifer became parents as teens from separate relationships, so when they met during their senior year of college in 2015, they bonded over that fact.
They soon started dating, and together, they welcomed their daughter Desirae in 2017.
They tied the knot in 2018 and welcomed a son, named Desmond, in 2021.
Both Darius and Jennifer also adopted their partners' children from their past relationships, making them a blended family of seven.
Jennifer now works as a model.
